summary: An ordinance granting to the Great Northern Railway Company, a corporation, its successors and assigns, the right, privilege and authority to locate, lay down, construct, maintain and operate in the perpetuity, certain railway tracks, in, along, upon and across certain designated streets, avenues, alleys and other public places within the limits of said city, and granting to said company rights of way for such tracks in, along, upon and across such streets, avenues, alleys and other public places.
